body.data:
SELECT
    s.ID,
    s.NAME_E,
    u.USER_NAME,
    s.NATIONAL_NO,

    CASE
        WHEN u.USER_NAME IS NOT NULL THEN 'True'
        ELSE 'False'
    END AS IS_REGISTERED,

    u.MOBILE_NUMBER AS USER_PHONE,
    u.DEVICE_ID,
    u.HOF_ID,
    u.REG_DATE,

    /* ===== IS_ENABLED with fallback ===== */
    CASE
        WHEN COALESCE(u.FLG_ENABLED, d.FLG_ENABLE) = 1 THEN 'true'
        ELSE 'false'
    END AS IS_ENABLED,

    s.NATIONALITY_E,
    s.MSTATUS_E,
    s.GENDER_E,
    s.BIRTH_DATE,

    /* ===== IS_BLOCKED ===== */
    CASE
        WHEN u.FLG_BLOCKED = 1 THEN 'true'
        ELSE 'false'
    END AS IS_BLOCKED,

    /* ===== IS_ADMIN ===== */
    CASE
        WHEN u.FLG_ADMIN = 1 THEN 'true'
        ELSE 'false'
    END AS IS_ADMIN,

    d.PHONE_NUMBER AS DEPENDENT_PHONE,
    d.CREATED_DATE AS DEPENDENT_CREATED_DATE,

    c.DEGREE_ID,
    c.END_DATE AS CONTRACT_EXPIRE_DATE,
    c.EMP_NO,
    c.CNT_ID AS CONTRACT_ID,
    c.COMP_ID,
    c.RC_ID,

    subsImg.IMG AS USER_IMAGE,
    comps.DESC_E AS COMPANY_NAME,
    rec.DESC_E AS INSURANCE_COMP_NAME,
    img_rc.IMG AS INSURED_LOGO,
    img_comp.IMG AS COMPANY_LOGO

FROM (
    SELECT SUBS_ID, CNT_ID
    FROM CORE.VW_APPS_CNT_SUBS
    WHERE HOF_ID = {{ appsmith.store.selectedUserId }}
      AND CNT_ID = {{ subsTable.selectedRow.CONTRACT_ID }}
) filtered

JOIN CORE.VW_APPS_SUBS s
    ON s.ID = filtered.SUBS_ID

LEFT JOIN COREAPPS.APP_USERS u
    ON u.SUBS_ID = s.ID

/* ===== Latest dependent phone + FLG_ENABLE ===== */
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT
        SUBS_ID,
        PHONE_NUMBER,
        CREATED_DATE,
        FLG_ENABLE,
        ROW_NUMBER() OVER (
            PARTITION BY SUBS_ID
            ORDER BY CREATED_DATE DESC
        ) AS rn
    FROM COREAPPS.DEPENDENTS_PHONE
) d
    ON d.SUBS_ID = s.ID
   AND d.rn = 1

LEFT JOIN CORE.VW_APPS_CNT_SUBS c
    ON c.SUBS_ID = filtered.SUBS_ID
   AND c.CNT_ID = filtered.CNT_ID

LEFT JOIN CORE.VW_APPS_COMPS comps
    ON comps.ID = c.COMP_ID

LEFT JOIN CORE.VW_APPS_COMPS rec
    ON rec.ID = c.RC_ID

LEFT JOIN CORE.VW_APPS_SUBS_IMG subsImg
    ON subsImg.REF_ID = u.SUBS_ID

LEFT JOIN CORE.VW_APPS_COMP_IMG img_comp
    ON img_comp.REF_ID = c.COMP_ID

LEFT JOIN CORE.VW_APPS_COMP_IMG img_rc
    ON img_rc.REF_ID = c.RC_ID
